unnormalised: Aiyyo, weather's messing with our yields again! Remember 20/05/2023? Scorching heat, crops dried faster than jalebi in a mela. Farmers in Punjab are saying similar things. This year's monsoon hit late around 10/07/2024. Even IARI can't predict this accurately. Wonder what Amma will say – maybe a puja on 15/08/2024 to appease the rain gods? Need better irrigation schemes, no? Rs. 50,000 compensation isn't enough!
normalised: Aiyyo, weather's messing with our yields again! Remember twentieth May two thousand and twenty three? Scorching heat, crops dried faster than jalebi in a mela. Farmers in Punjab are saying similar things. This year's monsoon hit late around tenth July two thousand and twenty four. Even I A R I can't predict this accurately. Wonder what Amma will say – maybe a puja on fifteenth August two thousand and twenty four to appease the rain gods? Need better irrigation schemes, no? Rupee fifty thousand compensation isn't enough!
